game.name: Miney Golf
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Steam Achievements, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Miney Golf is a casual miniature golf strategy game where players can pick up and place land mines all over a destructible course to either help them traverse obstacles or mess with their opponents. Play through several courses with your friends online through Steam!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Miney Golf is a casual miniature golf strategy game where players can pick up and place land mines all over a destructible course to either help them traverse obstacles or mess with their opponents. Play through several courses with your friends online through Steam!
